name: fomod-installer
description: Installer for xml and c# fomods

scripts.buildDev: node build.js Debug && copyfiles -f Build/bin/Debug/*.dll dist/ && copyfiles -f Build/bin/Debug/*.pdb dist/ && copyfiles -f Build/bin/Release/*.exe dist/
scripts.build: node build.js && copyfiles -f Build/bin/Release/*.dll dist/ && copyfiles -f Build/bin/Release/*.exe dist/

author: Black Tree Gaming Ltd.
